analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x8b392bec1eb2df9daea83110a1397a0d86c736f6.sol:
	Contract LeapCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x8b392bec1eb2df9daea83110a1397a0d86c736f6.sol#223)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x8b392bec1eb2df9daea83110a1397a0d86c736f6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/33/0x8b392bec1eb2df9daea83110a1397a0d86c736f6.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x8b392bec1eb2df9daea83110a1397a0d86c736f6.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
